name: Nuts N' Found
description:
In this 3rd person platformer adventure, you’re playing as a lost squirrel trapped in a haunted treehouse. With the help of your trusted light buddy, you will illuminate the path and overcome mystical obstacles and dangerous environment in order to find your way back home.

Credits: Design and ProductionVisual ArtsProgrammingTies de GrootBetty AleksievaStefan ClaasseSebastiaan van der KruijsMaria IoannouRalph WarrandTamar WeisalRenee RozemeijerTom van der Veeken
